item.title: Forest
item.description: INTRODUCTION Forest is 100% Active Directory. If you’re like me, a box with no webserver and only AD is a bit like staring at a blank wall - it’s hard to know where to start with enumeration. Forest is fantastic practice to break you out of that mindset, and help understand good methods for attacking AD environments. Recon mostly consists of going through checklists of ways to enumerate active directory in an unauthenticated manner.
